attributes.action: Save Motion Bristol from closing down
attributes.additional_details: It is a true landmark within Bristol and is recognised nationally and internationally as one of the great clubs, bringing in hundreds of thousands of people every year - therefore is a big contributor culturally. The closing of this club would cause uproar and would damage the city.
attributes.background: Motion is an iconic nightclub located in Bristol, having held a vast amount of events over the past 10 years. It is currently in danger due to potential mixed-use development plans, however, the club which is the second most popular club in the UK and the 10th most popular club in the world.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
